id.description: The ID of the line item.

name.description: The name of the line item.

state.description: The state of the line item.

daily_cap.description: The maximum budget (revenue type) to be spent in a single day. This value is only used if pace_evenly is NULL or false.

pace_evenly.description: Whether or not to pace the campaign budget evenly over the course of the line item (Campaign Group). This value is only used if a valid end_date is specified.

black_list_options.description: The list of domains or subdomains to be excluded in the campaign. "domain_action" must also be set. Example: "www.american-express.com, www.google.com"

revenue_type.description: With budget type set to revenue, choose a type of revenue tracking.

revenue_value.description: The value of the revenue type. For example, 10 with a revenue type 'margin' would have revenue computed with a 10% margin.

purchase_order_number.description: PO numbers can be used to align line_items with your own accounting systems

advertiser_id.description: The ID of the line item's advertiser.

start_date.description: The timestamp in UTC when the line item will begin.

end_date.description: The timestamp in UTC when the line item will end.

budget.description: The budget of the line item.

budget_type.description: Type of tracking model: media (Tracked by cost), click (Tracked by clicks, budget field should be # of clicks), imp (Tracked by impressions, budget field should be # of impressions) bid model.
